statements: DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE id = 1 AND year < 2010;
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND model = 'Corolla';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
DELETE FROM dealers WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year < 2015;
DELETE FROM car_model WHERE id = 2 AND make_id IN (SELECT id FROM car_make WHERE make = 'Toyota');
DELETE FROM car_year WHERE year = 2020 AND model_id IN (SELECT id FROM car_model WHERE model = 'Camry');
DELETE FROM customers WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Doe');
DELETE FROM orders WHERE vehicle_id = (SELECT id FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Honda' AND model = 'Civic') AND order_date < DATE '2022-01-01';
